item.description: Jim Nelson, a FMSSF board member and a long time MSSF camper, found an antique film of the Cape Cod fire of 1946. Jim will be showing the film to DCR staff and anyone who is interested in seeing it. This is a 16 mm movie, to be shown using a 16 mm projector. Should be interesting on many counts! Children are welcome. Bring your own popcorn!
item.how_to_find_us: Conference Building, across the street from MSSF Headquarters
item.why: This is incredible actual footage, with explanations, showing the devastating fire that swept through Cape Cod in 1946.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: View Antique Film of the 1946 Cape Cod Fire
